podcast.name: Drunks and Dragons - Dungeons and Dragons 5e Actual Play

podcast_episode.title: Episode 393 - Meteor Mayhem
podcast_episode.name: Episode 393 - Meteor Mayhem
podcast_episode.description: <p>These dang Gith raiders are trying to freaking kill us! Oh, momma, they have no idea what hell they have just released upon themselves. Like, they even said "take no prisoners"! To us! Big mistake, pal.</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor (<a href="http://twitter.com/spudcam" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">David Stewart</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/the_dan_chech" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/the_dan_chech</a>! Want the world to see your fan art? Tweet it with <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/drunksanddoodles" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">#DrunksAndDoodles</a>. </p>
podcast_episode.author: michael@geeklyinc.com (GeeklyInc.com)
podcast_episode.filename: Drunks and Dragons - Dungeons and Dragons 5e Actual Play - Episode 393 - Meteor Mayhem.mp3

podcast_episode.title: Episode 392 - Buca di Breakfast
podcast_episode.name: Episode 392 - Buca di Breakfast
podcast_episode.description: <p>We journey into the dang Astral Plane in order to journey into the dang Abyss. Wow, this is going to suck. What even is the Abyss? I feel like it will be wet for some reason? Squishy? Ah, here it goes! </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor (<a href="http://twitter.com/spudcam" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">David Stewart</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/sanderdoesart" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/sanderdoesart</a>! Want the world to see your fan art? Tweet it with <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/drunksanddoodles" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">#DrunksAndDoodles</a>. </p>

podcast_episode.title: Episode 391 - One Spicy Porridge
podcast_episode.name: Episode 391 - One Spicy Porridge
podcast_episode.description: <p>A slight interlude. A moment to take a breath. Our heroes savor the rich taste of home life before they head out into realms even they cannot fathom. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor (<a href="http://twitter.com/spudcam" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">David Stewart</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/LadyVidalis" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/LadyVidalis</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 390 - Temptation's Hand
podcast_episode.name: Episode 390 - Temptation's Hand
podcast_episode.description: <p>We return to the Tower of Grey in order to find our next step to complete this god killing artifact. Unfortunately, bad news is waiting for us, as it tends to do, in place we look to for comfort and safety. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor (<a href="http://twitter.com/spudcam" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">David Stewart</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://twitter.com/YourDarlingSon&sa=D&source=hangouts&ust=1609268550289000&usg=AFQjCNGslJ13QopQ5Q7qpExfdkvVfXOgUw" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/</a><a href="https://twitter.com/sanderdoesart" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/sanderdoesart</a>! Want the world to see your fan art? Tweet it with <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/drunksanddoodles" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">#DrunksAndDoodles</a>. </p>

podcast_episode.title: Episode 389 - Here We Are Now
podcast_episode.name: Episode 389 - Here We Are Now
podcast_episode.description: <p>After such a long journey we thought it would make sense to recap a bit of where we ended up and how we got there. Thanks to Michael and David for putting these clips together!!!</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor (<a href="http://twitter.com/spudcam" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">David Stewart</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://twitter.com/YourDarlingSon&sa=D&source=hangouts&ust=1609268550289000&usg=AFQjCNGslJ13QopQ5Q7qpExfdkvVfXOgUw" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/YourDarlingSon</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 388 - Voyage Across the Astral Sea
podcast_episode.name: Episode 388 - Voyage Across the Astral Sea
podcast_episode.description: <p>With the BTS secured our heroes must make their way back home! Sure, what is home anyways for adventurers such as ours, but surely they will be happy to sleep in a Non-White Flounder bed (even though the White Flounder's beds are amazing). </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor (<a href="http://twitter.com/spudcam" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">David Stewart</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://twitter.com/YourDarlingSon&sa=D&source=hangouts&ust=1609268550289000&usg=AFQjCNGslJ13QopQ5Q7qpExfdkvVfXOgUw" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/YourDarlingSon</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 387 - The Elite Forge
podcast_episode.name: Episode 387 - The Elite Forge
podcast_episode.description: <p>That rascal Tiamat is in our business again. Wish she would just like, buzz off. But we must get to the Elite Forge regardless of whichever god of chaos stand in our way!</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor (<a href="http://twitter.com/spudcam" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">David Stewart</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://twitter.com/artsy22ajl&sa=D&source=hangouts&ust=1608651443117000&usg=AFQjCNHATPcYCbGJ6dw_JJRKtMLmfBE7Tw" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/artsy22ajl</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 386 - The Final Bone Battle!? Part 2
podcast_episode.name: Episode 386 - The Final Bone Battle!? Part 2
podcast_episode.description: <p>That snake Lucius freaking cheated and tried to murder Skud! That rat! That villain! I hate him, but also respect his drive. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor (<a href="http://twitter.com/spudcam" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">David Stewart</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/yourdarlingson" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/yourdarlingson</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 385 - The Final Bone Battle!?
podcast_episode.name: Episode 385 - The Final Bone Battle!?
podcast_episode.description: <p>This one is for all the bone marbles! Can our heroes defeat this elite squad of bone villains? They have been training their whole month for this day and they will not lose! May lose a few folks along the way but they should be able to be brought back.</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor (<a href="http://twitter.com/spudcam" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">David Stewart</a>)!</p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://twitter.com/bridgitconnell&sa=D&source=hangouts&ust=1607446645521000&usg=AFQjCNGjbkiHWnGxTLYYsa5zEwDsfSRv4A" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/bridgitconnell</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 384 - The Curse of Exhaustion
podcast_episode.name: Episode 384 - The Curse of Exhaustion
podcast_episode.description: <p>What if a gift you were given from a "friend" was actually a dang curse!!! We explore this horrid notion on today's adventure.</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). podcast_episode.title: Episode 383 - Table Manners
podcast_episode.name: Episode 383 - Table Manners
podcast_episode.description: <p>Well, dang. Here we are. The dang CHAMPIONS! Well, the person who is allowed to challenge the champion, but still. What horrors will Lucious Incendous throw at us? Only one way to find out!!!</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor (<a href="http://twitter.com/spudcam" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">David Stewart</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/bridgitconnell" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">@bridgitconnell</a>! podcast_episode.name: Episode 382 - F Word Gary

podcast_episode.title: Episode 381 - Stepping Up to the Plate
podcast_episode.name: Episode 381 - Stepping Up to the Plate
podcast_episode.description: <p>While we do not sanction the destruction of Dodge's bone cards we are not going to pass up an opportunity when it presents itself. Sure, we feel bad for Dodge, but like, we need to win these bone card battles in order to save the multiverse.</p><p>Here is the giveaway we mention for CastleStorm II minis! <a href="https://gleam.io/UmKjO/castlestorm-2-miniatures-giveaway" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">https://gleam.io/UmKjO/castlestorm-2-miniatures-giveaway</a> </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor (<a href="http://twitter.com/spudcam" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">David Stewart</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://twitter.com/TeddyYudain&sa=D&source=hangouts&ust=1604426310987000&usg=AFQjCNGbdFEUyPz94oZ2Z8wMaMUnWYlXiQ" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/TeddyYudain</a>! podcast_episode.name: Episode 378 - The Crimes of Catherine Beanlord
podcast_episode.description: <p>Family. Momma Mia. The spiciest meatball of them all, some say. LIsten as we unpack a tale of familial woe that may hit close to home. podcast_episode.name: Episode 372 - Welcome to the Elemental Plane of Earth
podcast_episode.description: <p>Having solved the Water Gym and receiving the respective badge, our heroes rush to the Elemental Plane of Earth for more Bonecard Battles! Will these battles be hard as a rock? Or will Skud and his Bone Team pumice them?!</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor (<a href="http://twitter.com/spudcam" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">David Stewart</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/PamRamblin" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/PamRamblin</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 371 - Bonesplash 42 Part 2
podcast_episode.name: Episode 371 - Bonesplash 42 Part 2
podcast_episode.description: <p>Oh no, it is a freaking kraken! Aaaaaahhhh! It is so big and so gross and how... does it have a skeleton and bones and such everywhere? I get the body and face...but bone tentacles? We truly live in a cursed time.</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor (<a href="http://twitter.com/spudcam" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">David Stewart</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/YourDarlingSon/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/YourDarlingSon/</a>! podcast_episode.name: Episode 370 - Bonesplash 42

podcast_episode.title: Episode 369 - Bone Brothers
podcast_episode.name: Episode 369 - Bone Brothers
podcast_episode.description: <p>Sometimes you have to face your fears...even if those fears are your Father who happens to be A God. Hopefully you too have the love and support of your pals if and when you have to deal with your god father.</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.instagram.com/puppydigs/&sa=D&source=hangouts&ust=1596552918530000&usg=AFQjCNG_dLHtCKsAMplNiELhg0Ba0rl2Ug" target="_blank">https://www.instagram.com/puppydigs/</a>! Want the world to see your fan art? Tweet it with <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/drunksanddoodles" target="_blank">#DrunksAndDoodles</a> or head on over to the <a href="http://geeklyinc.com/forums/viewforum.php?f=29&sid=7bdf2613c92eafe07caf903791e519e8" target="_blank">forum</a>.</p>

podcast_episode.title: Bonus Episode - TFtFT: Shedding Misconceptions Episode 1
podcast_episode.name: Bonus Episode - TFtFT: Shedding Misconceptions Episode 1
podcast_episode.description: <p>Since there isn’t a Greetings, Adventurers! ep today, we thought we’d premiere Episode 1 of the latest Tales From the Foaming Tankard series! Normally this is a <a href="https://www.patreon.com/dndpodcast" target="_blank">Patreon </a>exclusive series but we couldn't not share the first episode with you! Join an elite group as they start a new adventure far in the East of Drunkeros. Yanghar, here we come!</p><p>In the far east of Drunkeros, across the Storm Sea, lies Yanghar... </p><p>Recent events have unfolded near Yanghar which require the specialized services of a unique group of adventurers...</p><p>Join Adrath (<a href="https://twitter.com/matthewmmorris" target="_blank">Matthew M Morris</a>), Flox (<a href="https://twitter.com/TypicalVeronica" target="_blank">Veronica Escamilla-Brady</a>), Belloresh (<a href="https://twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">David Stewart</a>), and YOUNG MAN WECK! (<a href="https://twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>) on an adventure that brings listeners to new exotic locations in the ever-expanding world of Drunkeros.</p><p>Dungeon Mastered by <a href="https://twitter.com/IThinkImFred" target="_blank">Fred Greenleaf</a></p><p>With additional characters voiced by:</p><p><a href="https://twitter.com/MaybeHiroshi" target="_blank">Hiroshi Sutherland</a></p><p><a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a></p><p><a href="https://twitter.com/JenniferCheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a></p><p><a href="https://twitter.com/TimLanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a></p><p>Produced and edited by <a href="https://twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a> </p><p>Art by <a href="https://twitter.com/YourDarlingSon" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/YourDarlingSon</a></p>
podcast_episode.author: michael@geeklyinc.com (GeeklyInc.com)
podcast_episode.filename: Drunks and Dragons - Dungeons and Dragons 5e Actual Play - Bonus Episode - TFtFT: Shedding Misconceptions Episode 1.mp3

podcast_episode.title: Episode 368 - The Party Father
podcast_episode.name: Episode 368 - The Party Father
podcast_episode.description: <p>We learn a little more about Skud's past in this very special episode of Greetings, Adventurers! I hope you brought a bucket for your tears. Also a sports drink to recover vitamins after crying so much.</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://twitter.com/artsy22ajl&sa=D&source=hangouts&ust=1595364271825000&usg=AFQjCNHxMi018WOQqr89U2poj6WRZ7u09w" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/artsy22ajl</a>! podcast_episode.title: Community Corner - A discussion of our responsibility in light of the current protests.
podcast_episode.name: Community Corner - A discussion of our responsibility in light of the current protests.
podcast_episode.description: <p>In solidarity with the protests against police violence across the world there will not be a normal episode today. Instead, we got together to talk about the Black Lives Matter movement and to discuss what our community could do to help in our own small way. Our emotions ran a little raw, but as a podcast with only white folks we felt like using our reach and privilege was the absolute least we could do.</p><p><br></p><p>Here is the google doc we discussed with links on how to support the movement and educate yourself.</p><p><a href="http://bit.ly/GapCastBLMResources" target="_blank">bit.ly/GapCastBLMResources</a></p><p><br></p><p>Obviously, we want to be corrected if we spread any false information as repeating false info helps no one. But (and I think this should go without saying), we will not tolerate any hate or criticism for the Black Lives Matter movement or for any of the victims murdered by the police.</p>
podcast_episode.author: michael@geeklyinc.com (GeeklyInc.com)
podcast_episode.filename: Drunks and Dragons - Dungeons and Dragons 5e Actual Play - Community Corner - A discussion of our responsibility in light of the current protests..mp3

podcast_episode.description: <p>With baited breaths our heroes prepare themselves to fight their greatest foe to date. The tyrant Pyre. A name who has struck fear around the land for hundreds of years. Today he will fall.</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://twitter.com/the_dan_chech&sa=D&source=hangouts&ust=1591106519266000&usg=AFQjCNFCHo7FMdGKCbzFUL1r45cdf-o7tQ" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/the_dan_chech</a>! podcast_episode.title: Bonus Episode - Frank's Hostile Takeover Part 2
podcast_episode.name: Bonus Episode - Frank's Hostile Takeover Part 2
podcast_episode.description: <p>Here is the thrilling conclusion to the Frank Based One Shot we ran for our 24 hour charity stream. Can our Hell Bank Heroes prevail against their dastardly foes??? Listen to find out!</p><p>On April 25th we got together with many of our online pals to raise money for <a href="https://geeklyinc.com/geeklyinc-24-hour-charity-stream-thank-you/" target="_blank">The Trevor Project</a>. We were able to raise an astounding $13,314 throughout the 25 hour stream and we are so, so, so proud of the whole Geekly Community! That donation page is still live, by the way - <a href="https://www.mightycause.com/story/Geeklytrevor2020" target="_blank">https://www.mightycause.com/story/Geeklytrevor2020</a>!</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://www.instagram.com/bridgitconnell/" target="_blank">https://www.instagram.com/bridgitconnell/</a>! Want the world to see your fan art? Tweet it with <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/drunksanddoodles" target="_blank">#DrunksAndDoodles</a> or head on over to the <a href="http://geeklyinc.com/forums/viewforum.php?f=29&sid=7bdf2613c92eafe07caf903791e519e8" target="_blank">forum</a>.</p>

podcast_episode.name: Bonus Episode - Frank's Hostile Takeover Part 1
podcast_episode.description: <p>On April 25th we got together with many of our online pals to raise money for <a href="https://geeklyinc.com/geeklyinc-24-hour-charity-stream-thank-you/" target="_blank">The Trevor Project</a>. We were able to raise an astounding $13,314 throughout the 25 hour stream and we are so, so, so proud of the whole Geekly Community! That donation page is still live, by the way - <a href="https://www.mightycause.com/story/Geeklytrevor2020" target="_blank">https://www.mightycause.com/story/Geeklytrevor2020</a>!</p><p>Listen here, those who dare, to a special tale of Frank and his bank co-workers facing danger, intrigue and properly filling out expense reports.</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by https://www.instagram.com/bridgitconnell/! Want the world to see your fan art? Tweet it with <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/drunksanddoodles" target="_blank">#DrunksAndDoodles</a> or head on over to the <a href="http://geeklyinc.com/forums/viewforum.php?f=29&sid=7bdf2613c92eafe07caf903791e519e8" target="_blank">forum</a>.</p>

podcast_episode.title: Greetings, Adventurers! / Dear Internet Cross Over Bonus Episode Extravaganza
podcast_episode.name: Greetings, Adventurers! / Dear Internet Cross Over Bonus Episode Extravaganza
podcast_episode.description: <p>We are thrilled to introduce you to our first Greetings, Adventurers! / Dear Internet cross over episode. Having both <a href="https://twitter.com/rbristow" target="_blank">Nick Bristow</a> and Mike Bachmann on the same podcast almost never happens but when you need to make Good Content you gotta bring out the big dogs. Enjoy our question and answering stylings and if you like the flavor of this go listen to <a href="https://twitter.com/askdearinternet" target="_blank">Dear Internet</a> wherever fine podcasts are sold. </p><p><br></p><p>The <s>adventure </s>continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://twitter.com/YourDarlingSon&sa=D&source=hangouts&ust=1586269403839000&usg=AFQjCNFWwM4jkHjYlAFarkaacGdoDfy3YQ" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/YourDarlingSon</a>! podcast_episode.description: <p>Your heroes return to relative safety with their newfound information and hostages. But maybe...Pyre and his pals have things in place to stop adventurers from walking out of the Spike with his hard earned info. Welp, I am sure nothing bad will happen. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://twitter.com/YourDarlingSon&sa=D&source=hangouts&ust=1586269403839000&usg=AFQjCNFWwM4jkHjYlAFarkaacGdoDfy3YQ" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/YourDarlingSon</a>! podcast_episode.name: Episode 352 - 480 Feet From Greatness
podcast_episode.description: <p>Our heroes make their way into Mastwick and buddy you know that is going to lead to some hijinks. Will the simulacrum of Silga Darvo be enough? Are the Darkblades still the honorable band of thieves we remember or have they succumbed to the darkness of the times? Find out some of these answers and more on today's episode! </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://twitter.com/DoodleKm&sa=D&source=hangouts&ust=1583271464394000&usg=AFQjCNHJAK54kqz8r26ghjk70SJcKfOibQ" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/DoodleKm</a>! That naughty dragon is going to get his just desserts after attacking us at Skud monastery and oh boy will he be shocked when he goes to Bone Card Prison. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://twitter.com/sanderdoesart&sa=D&source=hangouts&ust=1582650303275000&usg=AFQjCNH0y_Tww16-QpqjP_f2ns0YDamArg" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/sanderdoesart</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 348 - Dr. Varmus Gremp's Monster
podcast_episode.name: Episode 348 - Dr. Varmus Gremp's Monster
podcast_episode.description: <p>More Bone Card action but this time it is for a good cause! Hopefully your heroes are able to take down the evil Dr. Varmus Gremp and stop his nefarious schemes!</p><p>Super honored to have <a href="https://twitter.com/IThinkImFred" target="_blank">Fred Greenleaf</a> on the podcast! He is wonderful. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.instagram.com/contrarytocarrion/&sa=D&source=hangouts&ust=1580839471837000&usg=AFQjCNFXZ6rvLN3YLkH1K-7nFADc_NrBUw" target="_blank">https://www.instagram.com/contrarytocarrion/</a> ! podcast_episode.title: Episode 347 - The Gremp

podcast_episode.description: <p>Being an adventurer means having to spin a lot of plates. And sometimes those plates, well, you just have to let other plate spinners deal with. podcast_episode.title: DragonCon 2019 Live Show - A Jock Strap Jumble
podcast_episode.name: DragonCon 2019 Live Show - A Jock Strap Jumble
podcast_episode.description: <p>We were so, so, so lucky to be invited by the Strand Theater in Marietta, Georgia for their DragonCon show. We had...a little too much fun in what we are now calling "Fourth Episode Energy" but in our defense the fine folks at the Strand gave us like 30 Lime, Mango and Raz ber Ritas. And we had an hour meet and greet with VIP member of the audience which absolutely sky rocketed our energy to help us make the best Live Show to date! Seriously, we cannot thank everyone enough and we look forward to many, many more shows in the future. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Finding and scheduling a game night can be hard but <a href="http://gamelyapp.com" target="_blank">Gamelyapp.com</a> is there to help out!</p><p>Want to eat good dreadwing level meals at home without fighting slimes? podcast_episode.title: Episode 326 - The Under-Bank
podcast_episode.name: Episode 326 - The Under-Bank
podcast_episode.description: <p>Only way to go is up, even if up seems to be an abandoned sub floor of the hell bank. Like, what if there are truly monsterous things down here? I cannot imagine that they make sure nothing horrible, some discarded security measure deemed too cruel even for this hellish bank, roams these halls. But we must take this bank down if we are to make the realms safer so forward we go.</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/YourDarlingSon" target="_blank">@YourDarlingSon</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 325 - A Shattered Illusion
podcast_episode.name: Episode 325 - A Shattered Illusion
podcast_episode.description: <p>It seems like many somethings are not quite the something that they originally seemed to seem. We knew that we most likely were not on some sort of nice beach but I think we underestimated how treacherous this bank holiday could be. What's worse is that it is possible we are being used to further some other entities goals unbeknownst to us! Well, our quest is still an honorable one so we must press on. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/DoodleKm" target="_blank">@DoodleKm</a>! podcast_episode.name: Episode 323 - In the Bedroom
podcast_episode.description: <p>A classic tale in spy adventures is "What if the enemy is hot and wants to kiss???" Sure, it is dangerous, but so is doing spy things! Maybe doing a little kissy is going to make things more complicated but honestly you won't know until you find out. The mission is the most important thing and if having a bedroom moment helps he mission why not I say. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/bridgitconnell" target="_blank">@bridgitconnell</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 322 - One Bad Bungalow
podcast_episode.name: Episode 322 - One Bad Bungalow
podcast_episode.description: <p>Close your eyes. Imagine an idyllic tropical resort. You would imagine that they would have some sort of cabin filled with whatever your heart desires. Now imagine you are hearing screams from a pal you met on a Prison Plane. Not a fun thought, is it. That is the life of an adventurer and it is only going to get weirder. </p><p>With our emotions wounds somewhat healed we must head out into the most fearsome foe yet - a corporate mixer party. What will these dreaded hellions get into to sate their dark desires? If there is a limbo and conga line we are leaving. That is the final straw. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey (<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/Rattenkaefig" target="_blank">@Rattenkaefig</a>! Want the world to see your fan art? Tweet it with <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/drunksanddoodles" target="_blank">#DrunksAndDoodles</a> or head on over to the <a href="http://geeklyinc.com/forums/viewforum.php?f=29&sid=7bdf2613c92eafe07caf903791e519e8" target="_blank">forum</a>.</p><p>Finding and scheduling a game night can be hard but <a href="http://gamelyapp.com" target="_blank">Gamelyapp.com</a> is there to help out!</p><p>Want to eat good dreadwing level meals at home without fighting slimes? podcast_episode.name: Episode 320 - Preparing to Get Talented
podcast_episode.description: <p>With the extreme stakes bearing down on our heroes' shoulders they decide that the safest route to their goals is - A Talent Show. Weirder things have saved millions if our histories can be believed. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Fear all ye who miss <a href="http://bit.ly/2RiLNyu" target="_blank">Dwarven Forge’s Hellscape kickstarter</a>! Ending on July 1st, you will want to make sure you get in on this before hell freezes over.</p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/wingedhat" target="_blank">@wingedhat</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 319 - Love the Skin You're In
podcast_episode.name: Episode 319 - Love the Skin You're In
podcast_episode.description: <p>When danger is all around you it is easy to rely on past successes and charge into the unknown. Surely, since you have faced gods and survived, this next peril will be tough but manageable. Surely, we will be able to solve any problem thrown our way. Surely, any foe we face should be more afraid of us than we are of them. But that is not always the case, unfortunately. And you only have to be wrong once. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/Rattenkaefig" target="_blank">@Rattenkaefig</a>! Want the world to see your fan art? Tweet it with <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/drunksanddoodles" target="_blank">#DrunksAndDoodles</a> or head on over to the <a href="http://geeklyinc.com/forums/viewforum.php?f=29&sid=7bdf2613c92eafe07caf903791e519e8" target="_blank">forum</a>.</p><p><a href="http://bit.ly/2RiLNyu" target="_blank">Dwarven Forge’s Hellscape kickstarter</a> is now live and you simply don't want to miss it! </p><p>Finding and scheduling a game night can be hard but <a href="http://gamelyapp.com" target="_blank">Gamelyapp.com</a> is there to help out!</p><p>You gotta respect your teeth like a +1 greatsword, amirite? Head to <a href="http://GETQUIP.com/DRAGONS" target="_blank">GETQUIP.com/DRAGONS</a> to get your first re-fill pack for free! </p>

podcast_episode.title: Episode 318 - An Early End
podcast_episode.name: Episode 318 - An Early End
podcast_episode.description: <p>Our heroes have found the location of the artifact, which is their whole reason for being in Hell. All they have to do is get into the vault, grab it, and they can dip out of this weird and creepy corporate hell-retreat. Maybe this arc will end up being a short one after all!</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/a_goatfacekilla" target="_blank">@a_goatfacekilla</a>! podcast_episode.name: Episode 316 - Robo Reconnaissance
podcast_episode.description: <p>Look we know the hell bank vault is going to have a lot of defenses but what else are we supposed to do? Not try to break in??? How bad could it be? </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/wingedhat" target="_blank">@wingedhat</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 315 - Hell Room
podcast_episode.name: Episode 315 - Hell Room
podcast_episode.description: <p>This dang corporate retreat is going to kill us. Probably literally. This infernal bank has strange and dangerous magics we have never seen before and that is terrifying. Surely, we are strong enough to overcome any obsticle but at what cost? Being shot with hell beams hurts like...well...hell.</p><p>Also, a little announcement. As we have mentioned way back we are changing the name of the podcast. The reasons are many and complicated but we hope we still have your trust as we all work through this change. Only the name of the podcast is changing, nothing else! Still the same wild antics and really bad plans. We are pleased to finally reveal that the new name of our little D&D podcast is - Greetings, Adventurers!</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/sanderdoesart" target="_blank">@sanderdoesart</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 313 - The Corporate Retreat
podcast_episode.name: Episode 313 - The Corporate Retreat
podcast_episode.description: <p>If I can take a step outside of in character podcast descriptions for a second, it is obvious that Michael needed a break from trying (and usually failing) to kill us every week so he sent us to the beach. Michael may act like this is some sort of spooky hell beach but I am pretty sure we are just RPing being able to afford a vacation like this. This is what makes D&D so special - imagining a world where the impossible is possible. I am excited.  </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://www.instagram.com/jojo.draws/" target="_blank">jojo.draws</a>! Want the world to see your fan art? podcast_episode.name: Episode 309 - A Maze for You, Dear Drakoolus

podcast_episode.title: Episode 308 - The Head of Accounting
podcast_episode.name: Episode 308 - The Head of Accounting
podcast_episode.description: <p>Frank is cool now so we owe it to him to find out what is up with his weird, probably evil boss. Don't tell Frank, but any excuse to continue to attend the various brunches around the city is always at the top of our minds. If we happen to discover some sort of evil plan that ties all this god capturing shenanigans then that is just icing on my large cinnamon roll. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our regular editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>), and also our junior editor Alan Mathews (<a href="https://twitter.com/JAlanMathewsJr" target="_blank">@JAlanMathewsJr</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/DoodleKm" target="_blank">@DoodleKm</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 306 - What Hell to Travel Next
podcast_episode.name: Episode 306 - What Hell to Travel Next
podcast_episode.description: <p>When you are face to face with Ioun the goddess of knowledge you gotta take advantage of it. Our heroes are about to journey into extremely dangerous planes so naturally they try to get as much info as possible. Apparently they solved the safer god problems and the next few are a doozy and a half. They all sound terrible. But being a hero means you jump into danger when called to do so. Being a living hero means you make sure you know where you are landing and if the air is poison. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our regular editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>), and also our junior editor Alan Mathews (<a href="https://twitter.com/JAlanMathewsJr" target="_blank">@JAlanMathewsJr</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/DoodleKm" target="_blank">@DoodleKm</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 305 - A Grand Battle Part 2
podcast_episode.name: Episode 305 - A Grand Battle Part 2
podcast_episode.description: <p>The battle outside Deephome rages on, but will our heroes be able to keep their rag tag army in check against the onslaught of the approaching Dragons!? That is such a stressful thing to think about! Did we ever imagine the Aludra who woke up on that slab all those years ago and would be commanding an army? They grow up so fast. Unfortunately, there is another shade from Aludra's past on the horizon. Surely... it cannot be...I will not say that heroes name! Trickster! Charlatan! </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our regular editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>), and also our junior editor Alan Mathews (<a href="https://twitter.com/JAlanMathewsJr" target="_blank">@JAlanMathewsJr</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/sanderdoesart" target="_blank">@sanderdoesart</a>! Listen as we play out a huge battle and repel thousands of enemies from the entrance of the dwarven home land of Deephome. Gasp as a mighty brontosaurus covered in goblins smashes the ranks of a dragonborn cavalry. podcast_episode.title: Episode 303 - Something Mailbag this Way Comes
podcast_episode.name: Episode 303 - Something Mailbag this Way Comes
podcast_episode.description: <p>Before we jump into the next chunk of this arc we wanted to take a moment to answer y'all's burning questions! Thank you all so much for writing in. We always love doing these eps since it gives us a chance to wild out a bit. Next episode we will I guess go into some sort of worse place than Prison Planet so that is something nice to think about. I think one of the planes was entirely on fire? Working on our tans would be nice, I guess... Anyways I don't think there are any controversial questions this time (Pie is better than Cake) but feel free to scream at your listening device along with us.</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our regular editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>), and also our junior editor Alan Mathews (<a href="https://twitter.com/JAlanMathewsJr" target="_blank">@JAlanMathewsJr</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/DoodleKm" target="_blank">@DoodleKm</a>! podcast_episode.name: Episode 302 - Never Have We Ever
podcast_episode.description: <p>I think it is safe to say that the heroes of our story needed to let off a little steam. To collectively exhale, let their guard down and just act like all of existence isn't being threatened by some all powerful force. Luckily they have made some allies that many consider gods. It is good to have friends like that. Friends who have whole cities named after them. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our regular editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>), and also our junior editor Alan Mathews (<a href="https://twitter.com/JAlanMathewsJr" target="_blank">@JAlanMathewsJr</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/sanderdoesart" target="_blank">@sanderdoesart</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 300 - Swords and Sobriety Episode 1: Tavern Troubles
podcast_episode.name: Episode 300 - Swords and Sobriety Episode 1: Tavern Troubles
podcast_episode.description: <p>Few Podcasts survive to make their 300th episode and we probably would have been one of them if not for you! We are not kidding - we would have quit a long time ago ha ha. You choosing to join us for this wild ride has meant so, so, so, so much to all of us! Now we ask you to join us on our next journey. Our next safer and more ad friendly arc. Our answer to "wait, they just get drunk and play D&D...no thanks". Our earnest desire to be respected by WotC. Please respectfully, minding the local sound ordinances, for Swords and Sobriety Episode 1.</p><p>All kidding aside, we had so much fun recording this long episode. Maybe a little too much... </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our regular editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>), and also our junior editor Alan Mathews (<a href="https://twitter.com/JAlanMathewsJr" target="_blank">@JAlanMathewsJr</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art byPodcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/YourDarlingSon" target="_blank">@YourDarlingSon</a>!  Want the world to see your fan art? podcast_episode.title: Episode 299.5 - Power Fully Restored
podcast_episode.name: Episode 299.5 - Power Fully Restored
podcast_episode.description: <p>This is it! Josail Longshadow and Pelor is within our grasps! We are stronger than ever and full of righteous anger. Our quest is to free a god for, Pelor's sake, so we have no choice but to pull out all the stops and end this once and for all. Well, until the next god goes missing. But we are even more prepared for that! We must stop whatever is going on here because not only our plane but all planes of existence could be wiped out! I hope Josail wore a clean pair of undies today.</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our regular editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>), and also our junior editor Alan Mathews (<a href="https://twitter.com/JAlanMathewsJr" target="_blank">@JAlanMathewsJr</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/LadyVidalis" target="_blank">@LadyVidalis</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 299 - A Crystalline Horror
podcast_episode.name: Episode 299 - A Crystalline Horror
podcast_episode.description: <p>I think we all knew there was going to be something weird inside the armory or whatever your would call this room. An impound? Is that what you would call it? Anyway this creature is terrifying and I hate fighting it. Something...is screaming inside. Something, dare I say, familiar? Every quest has a moment when you stop and just for one second appreciate just how weird things have gotten. Hopefully this weird crystal belly haver is that moment. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our regular editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>), and also our junior editor Alan Mathews (<a href="https://twitter.com/JAlanMathewsJr" target="_blank">@JAlanMathewsJr</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/YourDarlingSon" target="_blank">@YourDarlingSon</a>! podcast_episode.title: Podcast of Waterdeep Bonus Episode - The Dragon Ante
podcast_episode.name: Podcast of Waterdeep Bonus Episode - The Dragon Ante
podcast_episode.description: <p>Hello, wonderful adventurers! Due to some illness we are sharing this special Waterdeep: Dragon Heist themed episode. We had two special guest and oh my lorde it was so much fun. Super duper thank you to <a href="https://twitter.com/CarlosCrits" target="_blank">Carlos Luna</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/adalrifai" target="_blank">Adal Rifai</a> for joining us on this adventure. So grab your favorite mixture of Dr. Pepper (I am a 60% pepper, 30% diet coke, 10% pepsi man) and listen as we save the day. Sort of. Well...we make it easier for others to save the day. But we definitely helped!</p><p>You can find the rest of the Podcast of Waterdeep story on http://dnd.wizards.com/dungeon-delve/podcast-hub. </p><p>(Just going to keep this normal down here even though zero of the characters here are in this.) The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our regular editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>), and also our junior editor Alan Mathews (<a href="https://twitter.com/JAlanMathewsJr" target="_blank">@JAlanMathewsJr</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/YourDarlingSon" target="_blank">@YourDarlingSon</a>! Want the world to see your fan art? Tweet it with <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/drunksanddoodles" target="_blank">#DrunksAndDoodles</a> or head on over to the <a href="http://geeklyinc.com/forums/viewforum.php?f=29&sid=7bdf2613c92eafe07caf903791e519e8" target="_blank">forum</a>.</p>

podcast_episode.title: Episode 295 - The Proverbial Pin in the Beans
podcast_episode.name: Episode 295 - The Proverbial Pin in the Beans
podcast_episode.description: <p>When a plan just makes sense, you can't think about it too hard. You just have to go for it. Making a crime boss eat his own poisoned pin in a bowl of beans is both poetic and a richly deserved fate. In this episode we watch this beautifully concocted plan play out. Nothing goes wrong.</p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our regular editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>), and also our junior editor Alan Mathews (<a href="https://twitter.com/JAlanMathewsJr" target="_blank">@JAlanMathewsJr</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://www.instagram.com/cclaray/" target="_blank">@cclaray</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 293 - One More Quick Thing about Corn
podcast_episode.name: Episode 293 - One More Quick Thing about Corn
podcast_episode.description: <p>Slowly but surely the gang is getting their footing in this terrible prison. But, they need to make sure they do not botch this up since they will only have one real chance to grab the blood or the book before the guards get wise and do something about it. Maybe it is losing some of their magical abilities but it looks like our heroes are showing some restraint for the first time ever. But as we are finding out making allies in this place is just as dangerous as fighting a large Slaad. Luckily we have all these tasty and nutritious beans and corns. Well, the corn isn't for us...but still.  </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our regular editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>), and also our junior editor Alan Mathews (<a href="https://twitter.com/JAlanMathewsJr" target="_blank">@JAlanMathewsJr</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/artsy22ajl" target="_blank">@artsy22ajl</a>!  Want the world to see your fan art? podcast_episode.title: Episode 292 - The Sausage Heist
podcast_episode.name: Episode 292 - The Sausage Heist
podcast_episode.description: <p>When you have nothing to work with in a magical super prison you have to latch onto the small victories. Maybe you get a small rock or a sharpened toothbrush. Who knows what a level 17 adventurer could do with that? Baby steps is the name of the game. Plus, you have to keep your moral up in a place like this. And nothing would make me and my buds happier than that sausage platter over there. I think that guard has a plate of 90 sausages...that is so many. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our regular editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>), and also our junior editor Alan Mathews (<a href="https://twitter.com/JAlanMathewsJr" target="_blank">@JAlanMathewsJr</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/the_checha" target="_blank">@the_checha</a>!  Want the world to see your fan art? podcast_episode.title: Episode 291 - First Days on the Job
podcast_episode.name: Episode 291 - First Days on the Job
podcast_episode.description: <p>Having gotten their work assignments, our heroes now actually have to go to them and perform adequately enough to not get fired or murdered. Things are very strict in this prison city so naturally our jobs are not that great. But, there are some great secrets and even greater joys to be found for those that look for them. Plus, everyone gets to eat some nice beans, which is great for the soul. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our regular editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>), and also our junior editor Alan Mathews (<a href="https://twitter.com/JAlanMathewsJr" target="_blank">@JAlanMathewsJr</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/killurmonkey" target="_blank">@killurmonkey</a>!  Want the world to see your fan art? podcast_episode.title: Episode 290 - Getting to Work
podcast_episode.name: Episode 290 - Getting to Work
podcast_episode.description: <p>Things sure are complicated in this prison. I guess it is probably the most complicated prison in all of the realms if you think about it. Anyways, we gotta get out of here and I guess free our blood? That is a weird thing to say but we have definitely said weirder things. But even if we escape the physical grounds of the prison who knows what they can do with our blood. So, that is a huge priority. So is getting to work! Finally, we got our job assignments. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our regular editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>), and also our junior editor Alan Mathews (<a href="https://twitter.com/JAlanMathewsJr" target="_blank">@JAlanMathewsJr</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/killurmonkey" target="_blank">@killurmonkey</a>!  Want the world to see your fan art? podcast_episode.title: Episode 288 - Welcome to Grull
podcast_episode.name: Episode 288 - Welcome to Grull
podcast_episode.description: <p>Dang! We are in the slammer! No big deal though, I am sure we will come up with something. Many adventurers have been locked up and then came up with their most daring stories from their dangerous escapes. Sure, we have no way to access our magics... and we can't find Skud or Frank... but we are making new life-long friends. podcast_episode.title: Episode 287 - Welcome to the Shadowfell
podcast_episode.name: Episode 287 - Welcome to the Shadowfell
podcast_episode.description: <p>Entering into a new plane of existence is always a dicey proposition. Sure, you could be prepared for anything in your realm and immediately be a fish out of water in this new one. Things are just that different. The Shadowfell has an even more ruthless reputation so it came as no surprise that entering through their front door was not great...But I am sure nothing bad will happen. We are heroes! Folks love heroes no matter which realm you are in. </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our regular editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>), and also our junior editor Alan Mathews (<a href="https://twitter.com/JAlanMathewsJr" target="_blank">@JAlanMathewsJr</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/Psycho_Captain" target="_blank">@Psycho_Captain</a>! Want the world to see your fan art? podcast_episode.name: Episode 286 - Preparing to Enter the Shadows
podcast_episode.description: <p>Now that our course is set we actually have to figure out how to get to the ding dang Shadowfell. It isn't easy! Plus we need time to catch our breath while in Pelor's Hope. Toby is hard at work on a solution thanks to the aide of the some of the greatest minds in Drunkeros while the rest of the gang spent time with old friends or made new, bitter rivals. The Die is Cast. The Iron is Hot. Let's get ready to enter a horrible dangerous plane of existence that we absolutely shouldn't go to unless all of existence is under assault.  </p><p>The adventure continues with Skud Derringer (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Lahnik "Lahni" Caplain (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our regular editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>), and also our junior editor Alan Mathews (<a href="https://twitter.com/JAlanMathewsJr" target="_blank">@JAlanMathewsJr</a>)!  </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/a_goatfacekilla" target="_blank">@a_goatfacekilla</a>! Want the world to see your fan art?
